properties.name: googlesearch.apiKey
properties.description: API key for accessing the Google Custom Search API.

properties.name: googlesearch.cx
properties.description: Search engine identifier (cx) for the Google Custom Search API.

properties.name: googlesearch.searchUrl
properties.description: The URL endpoint for the Google Custom Search API.

properties.name: googlesearch.record.enabled
properties.description: Enable recording of search results to a file.

properties.name: googlesearch.record.folder
properties.description: The folder where recorded search results will be stored.

properties.name: googlesearch.record.fromClasspath
properties.description: Enable loading recorded search results from classpath resources before falling back to the folder.

properties.name: googlesearch.defaults.lr
properties.description: Default language restriction (lr) for the search.

properties.name: googlesearch.defaults.cr
properties.description: Default country restriction (cr) for the search.

properties.name: googlesearch.defaults.sort
properties.description: Default sort option for the search.

properties.name: googlesearch.defaults.hl
properties.description: Default interface language (hl) for the search.
